name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Scripting Access Incident
description: This playbook addresses incidents involving unauthorized access through scripting interfaces on internal servers.

action--94af6a00-beef-4d7c-b18a-0f1b577d.name: Kill malicious process
action--94af6a00-beef-4d7c-b18a-0f1b577d.description: Terminate the unauthorized shell process that was opened.

parallel--f9815a00-4c91-42e8-b8dd-76ff19.name: Parallel actions for incident response
parallel--f9815a00-4c91-42e8-b8dd-76ff19.description: Perform multiple actions simultaneously to mitigate the incident.

action--4db5c027-05e4-4f96-bec7-ca2dc4de.name: Scan and quarantine compromised files
action--4db5c027-05e4-4f96-bec7-ca2dc4de.description: Perform a scan of the system to find and quarantine any compromised files.

while-condition--7e91c8bd-8d24-4a4b-b3f4.name: Check if scan is clean
while-condition--7e91c8bd-8d24-4a4b-b3f4.description: Loop until the system scan is confirmed to be clean.

action--ee43b598-e2c9-4d00-a6cb-1cf333b3.name: Disable vulnerable script interfaces
action--ee43b598-e2c9-4d00-a6cb-1cf333b3.description: Disable execution rights on vulnerable scripts to prevent further exploitation.

action--c5dbf1ea-cd6c-4cf1-8399-48eddbc2.name: Update network firewall rules
action--c5dbf1ea-cd6c-4cf1-8399-48eddbc2.description: Block outbound traffic from suspicious IPs.

action--bd7aad8f-d1c9-4f7e-92d5-7864c882.name: Notify security team
action--bd7aad8f-d1c9-4f7e-92d5-7864c882.description: Alert the security team regarding the detected incident.

commands.command: echo 'Incident detected. Immediate action required.' | mail -s 'Security Alert' security_team@xyz.org
